component.attributes:
&input_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
title false java.lang.String Displays a title text at the top of calendar
mindate false java.lang.Object Sets calendar's minimum visible date. Can be java.lang.String or java.util.Date. If String, mindate will be parsed with the format "MM/dd/yyyy".
maxdate false java.lang.Object Sets calendar's maximum visible date. Can be java.lang.String or java.util.Date. If String, maxdate will be parsed with the format "MM/dd/yyyy".
selection false java.lang.String single Sets calendar's selection mode, "single" selects only one date, "multiple" can select multiple dates. Default value is "single".
pages false java.lang.Integer 1 Enables multiple page rendering if more than 1, default value is 1.
close false java.lang.Boolean true Displays a close icon the top of calendar
mode false java.lang.String popup
inline|popup, Defines how the calendar will be displayed; "inline" only displays a calendar, "popup" displays an input text and a popup button
pattern false java.lang.String MM/dd/yyyy DateFormat pattern, default is "MM/dd/yyyy"
locale false java.lang.Object Locale for localization and date conversion, can be String or a java.util.Locale instance.
showWeekdays false java.lang.Boolean true Determines rendering of weekday headers
monthFormat false java.lang.String Specifies display format of months, possible values are "short", "medium", "long"(default)
weekdayFormat false java.lang.String Determines rendering of weekday format, possible values are "1char", "short"(default), "medium", "long"
startWeekday false java.lang.Integer 0 Specifies first day of week, by default it's 0 corresponding to sunday
popupIcon false java.lang.String Icon of the popup button
navigator false java.lang.Boolean true Enables month/year navigator
pagedate false java.lang.Object Initial month and year shown on calendar in MM/yyyy format, can be a String or a java.util.Date.
timeZone false java.lang.Object String or a java.util.TimeZone instance to specify the timezone used for date conversion, defaults to TimeZone.getDefault()
showWeekHeader false java.lang.Boolean false Determines displaying week headers.
showWeekFooter false java.lang.Boolean false Determines displaying week footer.
